title: Handwritten(?) Sans Serif font
content:
I'd appreciate any and all help with this font, thank you! Been searching for it ever since my previous laptop died years ago and wiped out all of my data before I got the chance to back it up. Image source's from a Tumblr user.

I tried identifying it online and found similar ones, but I just couldn't seem to locate the exact font for some reason.

Font: 

 Yoon Design/CreChoM 

Solved By: 

 [DPape](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317184041/http:/typophile.com/user/3945 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [IMG\_20140815\_104141-1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317184041/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_20140815_104141-1.jpg) | 198.11 KB |
author: skulls

comments.content:
Hoof Sans Black is close, but not quite:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/scholtz/hoof/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317184041/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/scholtz/hoof/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/scholtz/hoof/")
Thanks a bunch kthomps5 and DPape!
